content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for considering my apartment, Hassan. I understand that you are looking for a reasonable rental price. As a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains while also providing a comfortable living space for my tenants.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This price takes into account the current market rates and the condition of the apartment.

I hope this proposal is acceptable to you. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. 

I understand that the apartment is 25 square meters, which is smaller than expected. However, the location is excellent, and it is close to many amenities. I am willing to pay the proposed rental price of 700 Euros per month, as it is within my budget. 

Thank you for your consideration, and I look forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 700 Euros per month, Hassan. I appreciate your understanding about the size of the apartment and the excellent location.

I am glad to hear that the proposed rental price is within your budget. If you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or move-in process, please do not hesitate to ask.

I look forward to welcoming you as my new tenant and ensuring that you have a pleasant experience living in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you Mister Heine. 

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. I will pay the first month's rent of 700 Euros on the agreed-upon date. 

Furthermore, I will contact you if I have any issues or questions regarding the apartment or the lease agreement. 

Thank you again for your help and consideration.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
You're welcome, Hassan. I appreciate your prompt response and your willingness to sign the lease agreement and pay the first month's rent on time.

I am glad to hear that you will contact me if you have any issues or questions regarding the apartment or the lease agreement. As your landlord, it is my responsibility to ensure that you have a comfortable and enjoyable living experience in my apartment.

Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to your tenancy.
name: Heinrich Heine
